entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Wasm][AOT] `Assertion: should not be reached at mini-llvm.c:5017` #66319
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for disabled library test projects #66314
  • [wasm] Determine what default value to use for `$(EmccInitialHeapSize)` #66313
  • OpenSSL error with Ubuntu 22.04 on Arm32 architecture #66310
  • Program halts with `Bus error: 10` on .NET 6 osx-arm64 #66302
  • Change SocketsHttpHandler's default ConnectTimeout to a reasonable finite value #66297
  • [API Proposal]: Add UriSchemeUrn field to Uri #66293
  • Message : No credentials are available in the security package (Rest Sharp C#) #66283
  • Blazorwasm : deployment with aot compilation and with out aot compilation #66287
  • [API Proposal]: Support a lower bound on BoundedChannelOptions #66281
  • Test failure JIT/opt/AssertionPropagation/ArrBoundBinaryOp/ArrBoundBinaryOp.sh #66279
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\reverse\\reverse\\reverse.cmd #66278
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/complus_config/name_config_with_pid/name_config_with_pid.sh #66276
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/threadpool/bindhandle/bindhandlenull/bindhandlenull.sh #66274
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\threadpool\\bindhandle\\bindhandleinvalid6\\bindhandleinvalid6.cmd #66273

Closed

  • Remove unsupported fields from `GeneratedDllImport` #61181
    7.0.0
  • Environment.ProcessPath shouldn't be marked as nullable #66288
  • Consider adding RegexOptions.RightToLeft support back to compilation #62345
    7.0.0
  • Slow "Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release" #65626
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests] Tracking issue for test failures with AOT #51251
    7.0.0
  • Customer reports occasional errors in event log when stopping Windows service #66294
  • Unable to resolve service for type 'MyApp.Data.MyDBContext' while attempting to activate 'MyApp.Services.MyService'.at Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.CallSiteFactory.CreateArgumentCallSites #66148
  • Not documented that the List<T>.RemoveAll method can corrupt the list #66255
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\reverseouter\\reverseouter\\reverseouter.cmd #66277
    7.0.0
  • JIT Optimization: Eliminate duplicate `bswap` #66249
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.RenamedEventArgsTests.RenamedEventArgs_ctor_OldFullPath_DirectoryIsRelativePathFromCurrentDirectoryInGivenDrive #65042
    7.0.0
  • Is it possible replacing .NET System libraries with custom ones? #66246
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStreamReadTests.TestAsyncErrorStream_SynchronizingObject test failed #65955
  • [NativeAOT] KeyNotFoundException thrown when compiling dotnet/performance microbenchmarks boilerplate #66028
  • TIME OUT - Mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux arm64 release #66083
  • Regressions in System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamTests #66012
  • Add MemberNotNullWhen to Type.IsArray #66286
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'type == genActualType(type)' during 'Morph - Global' #66269
  • JIT: Invalid result on x86 with forward sub #66242
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add architecture ARMv6 to Architecture enum #63310
  • `ProviderAliasAttribute` can be sealed? #66078
  • HttpClient throws exception with message "The proxy tunnel request to proxy 'xxx' failed with status code '407'."'" instead of returning a response with ProxyAuthenticationRequired #66133
  • Test failure readytorun/determinism/crossgen2determinism/crossgen2determinism.sh #66275
  • Regex Matches Count gives ArgumentOutOfRangeException (regression) #66212
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE] [wasm] Testing disabled tests #66318
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add intrinsics for several operators #66317
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix compatibility with NTLM authentication to McAfee Web Gateway #66315
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix ConditionalFactAttribute instances in ILPROJ tests #66312
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add tests for `ijwhost` #66308
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Rename `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` -> `LibraryImportAttribute` #66307
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Try additional nuget retries #66306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Disable failing bindhandleinvalid tests #66303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Fix incompatibility between runtime and nuget package #66301
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [monoapi] Add mono_method_get_unmanaged_callers_only_ftnptr #66299
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.MAUI
  • Stop generating `CLS_VAR` for 64 bit targets #66298
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix incompatibility between runtime and nuget package #66295
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Mark EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption and EncryptionPolicy.AllowNoEncryption as obsolete #66292
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Do not propagate RHS flags in block morphing #66291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add MultiModule test to issues.targets #66289
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0

Merged

  • JIT: Optimize movzx after setcc #66245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revisiting nullable annotations on caching #66215
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [wasm] Rename `$(EmccInitialMemory)` to `$(EmccInitialHeapSize)` #66233
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use runtime and targeting pack version of System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging. #66284
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [wasm][aot] Disable `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Unit.Tests` #66311
    arch-wasm
  • Fix compatibility with NTLM authentication to McAfee Web Gateway #66305
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Fix missing StringSyntax attribute in Regex ref assembly #66309
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable RegexOptions.RightToLeft and lookbehinds in compiler / source generator #66280
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Use RegexGenerator in applicable tests #66179
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Convert* for Vector{64, 128} on ARM64 #65946
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #66248
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • remove invalid System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher tests #66296
    area-System.IO, test-bug
  • Fix a couple issues with `GTF_GLOB_REF` setting #66247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Backport docs fixes for Cbor #66180
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Annotating Native CoreLib library to be AOT friendly #66112
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix workaround for static virtual methods #66290
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix clash between tentative method optimizations #66145
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Merikhamoyan vector intrinsics operators #66002
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Decommit region tails #66008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Count `OBJ/BLK` as memory uses #66135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not create small constants while morphing cascading addition #66270
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix address exposure in forward sub (x86) #66253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix performance regression in SSL handshake #66077
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add missing regex position check after BOL optimization #66216
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Fix race conditions in SystemEvents shutdown logic #66230
    Servicing-consider, area-Microsoft.Win32, 6.0.x
  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #65785
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add partial to the enclosing types when running the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport fixer #65452
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions` #65403
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Remove compiler warning suppression #66234
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Remove OP_FCONV_TO_I/OP_RCONV_TO_I from the back ends, co… #66268
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Moving "Generic Math" in box and making it no longer experimental #65731
    area-System.Numerics, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Stop collecting disposables if changed token encountered #66265
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Adding Count(ReadOnlySpan<char>) Overloads #66026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Condition Windows SslCertificateTrust test on Registry value #65848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] [ILVerify] Recognize type equivalence of two types with `System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeIdentifierAttribute` #64413
    area-ILVerification, Future
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Put WeakAttribute support under an ifdef #66213
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Make the `EventSource` generator incremental et.al. #64579
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • use the name of the header when throwing exception for invalid chars #66250
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Remove WebRequest from SoundPlayer #65854
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Fix the accounting for gen 1 allocations by taking into account what … #60248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not mark implicit byrefs with GTF_GLOB_REF #66266
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow `dotnet workload list --machine-readable` to work with prior SDK versions #24254
    6.0.3xx
  • Add support for `--os` and `--arch` to the `restore` command #24251

PullRequests

Created

  • Update CODEOWNERS #24253
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24214
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1648578 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35'. #60006
  • Verify incremental parsing merged `EqualsGreaterThanToken` in `ParseLambdaExpression()` #60002
  • `GetHashCode` of `Span<T>` is not suggested in `nameof` context #59998
  • CoreCompile target claims the wrong input for signing key #59992
    17.2
  • Win32ResourceFile not working #59990
  • ArgumentNullException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.AnalyzerExecutor.ExecuteBlockActionsCore #59988

Closed

  • SyntaxContexts IsGlobalStatementContext should take file scoped namespaces into consideration #59931
    17.3
  • CSharpGoToImplementation.SimpleGoToImplementation test is not deterministic #59950
    17.2
  • Valid keywords missing from completion list between parentheses #58921
    17.2
  • IntelliSense suggests GetType on a span, but it won't compile #35178
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from EditAndContinue.BreakpointSpans.TryGetBreakpointSpan #59827
    17.2
  • BUG in VS2022 on Visual Basic code when click on Peek Definition doesn't show the element, shows the file where is declared at the first line. #58809
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix support for OOP reporting diagnostics in source generated files #60016
    Area-Analyzers
  • Clarify breaking change documentation for struct initialization and correct link #60015
    Area-Compilers
  • Inline Diagnostics Multi-Line Errors #60013
    Area-IDE
  • Handle invalid syntax in CSharpRecommendationServiceRunner #60012
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60011
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove obsolete helpers #60010
    Area-IDE
  • Add details on validating related to EnC #60008
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IsFabricatedToken assert #60005
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify code with helper method #60000
    Area-IDE
  • KeyOriginatorFile is input to csc task #59999
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • [LSP] Allow Razor to utilize C# LSP server in tests #59995
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Fix typo in CodeGenDifferences.md #59994
    Area-SDK and Samples
  • Trim leading blank lines in IDE0017 #59993
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • ColorSchemes namespace refactoring #59985
    Area-IDE
  • Enable embedded languages to export the identifier they should be associated with in comments/attributes #59983
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Flatten Implementation directory in VS layer #59986
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Always enable breakable range LSP handler #59997
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, 17.2
  • Update integration tests to support both possible Go To Implementation results #59956
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • CSharpImportAdder should be able to add the intended import if the identifier is a var #59947
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #60003
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • SyntaxContext's GlobalStatementContext changes #59957
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update version number for our 17.3 Preview 1 builds #60001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add build triggers to azure pipeline yaml #60009
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update LOC branch for 17.2 release #59996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge features/patterns-span-char to release/dev17.3 #59962
    Area-Compilers
  • Expose ForceExpandedCompletionIndexCreation option to O# #59958
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add build triggers to azure pipeline yaml #60007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Capability tracking #59938
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Refactor the embedded-language-detector components to make them reusable for any languages. #59987
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude object's methods from ref struct completion list #59884
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59991
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #59984
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Annotate BreakpointSpans and fix NREs #59846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Break out embedded language classification (MEF side) #59905
    Area-IDE
  • Add new feature to fix invalid constraints. #59889
    Area-IDE, Feature Request

Updated

  • Merge main to release/dev17.3 #60018
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #60017
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify consumption side of the new async navigation helpers. #59838
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up info bar and error reporting service #59981
    Area-IDE
  • Move diagnostic service to LSP layer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Require a matching regular operator for a checked operator #59937
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Fix !! incremental parsing #59977
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #59968
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59971
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #59874
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of a new 'lightweight' background-work-indicator that we can use in-situ in the editor. #59759
    Area-IDE
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 2 #59980
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused local #59963
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE
  • fix braces indentation for anonymous methods (#47237) #59979
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Standalone WebAssembly with MSAL Microsoft work accounts does not return JWT (access_token) #40582
  • No brotli compression _blazor #40581
  • Performance regression for larger responses in AspNetCore 6.0 with HttpSys and NewtonsoftJson #40579
  • build fails for new WebAPI project after switching to TargetFrameworks (plural) #40577
  • Blazor InputFile: Cannot pick files more than once #40574
    .NET 7 Planning
  • SignalR cant invoke a parameterless method #40573
  • Productionize ClientAssets #40572
    Backlog
  • Minor error in null checking of constructor of Microsoft.AspNetCore.Routing.Template class. #40571
    Backlog
  • SignalR 6.x doesn't work with android il2cpp #40569
  • Not able to debug blazorwasm project in VSCode #40568
  • Consider trimmer friendly overloads for HttpRequestJsonExtensions / HttpResponseJsonExtensions #40566
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Partial views as tag helpers for Razor Pages #40563
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor WASM : Adding MVC Route does not work on published version but works on lcoal #40565
  • Blazor Server - NotAuthorized is shown before Authorized #40435
  • Blazor app breaks on Chrome Mobile #40528
  • Strings.PlatformNotSupported_DataSqlClient in blazor #40559
  • [HTTP/3] Reading the request headers timed out. #36669
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Reporting and Printing In Blazor #40557
  • Unable to write Integration Tests for Blazor Webassembly (deps.json is missing) and Dependency Injection #40549
  • JavaScript component generation for Vue #40539
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets(442,5): error : Two assets found targeting the same path with incompatible asset kinds #40416
  • Add `AuthorizationFilterAttribute` likes `ActionFilterAttribute` #40542
  • [investigation] - Investigate option `useMordernNet` of omnisharp for aspnetcore codespaces #40560

PullRequests

Created

  • Update HttpContextAccessor.cs #40578
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • After RequestAborted, Response.BodyWriter does not signal IsCompleted/IsCanceled #40570
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • !nits! Slight Testing cleanup #40564
    area-infrastructure, test-fixed

Merged

  • Update CODEOWNERS #40580
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40467
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40468
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.24

Updated

  • Arm64 installers Take 2 #40562
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers
  • Update sdk to v7.0.100-preview.3.22122.1 #40353
    area-infrastructure
  • Trim Http.Extensions #40561
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task (#40198) #40533
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Build .rpm packages for linux arm64 #40485
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `e2c62a7` to `930ccc7` #40466
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build not working in MAUI Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 [32307.209.main] #5108
  • [Windows] Button text and button semantic text get focused separately #5107
  • [Windows] Shell AppBar is empty but reads oddly with Narrator #5106
  • [Android] Shell AppBar Title is set and read aloud twice #5105
  • Control Pressed and Release and VisualState Groups do not behave as expected. #5104
  • Improve template build with Arcade Templating MSBuild tasks #5101
  • Opacity has no effect on Frame #5100
  • Update Contributing.md #5099
  • [Paper cut] Load local HTML file with WebView #5098
  • MAUI Blazor default application won't build if wasm-tools is not installed #5097
  • Entry and Editor TextTransformation is not working #5095
  • Pending stuff to render correctly any Shape #5094
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • The views overlap and ScrollView Scroll does not work when FlexLayout is child #5091
  • The scrolled event does not fire when ScrollView Oreientation is Horizontal #5090

Closed

  • Blazor Desktop dev tools enablement #2542
  • Building templates on a non-Windows machine is broken #4871
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting WPF #4927
  • First pass at consistent Mapper naming and shifting to interfaced handlers #4378
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] Add `<SupportedOSPlatformVersion>` to indicate the min supported bits in the assemblies #2322
  • Application.UserAppTheme is no longer consulted when applying AppThemeBindings #5066
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Map Controls.DatePicker.TextTransform #2987
  • Map Controls.TimePicker.TextTransform #2988
  • Map Controls.Picker.TextTransform #2989
  • [Bug] Update SecureStorage to use AndroidX Security #2518
  • RefreshView.RefreshColor must be specifed. #5069
  • [Android] Not correctly rendering Paths #4052
  • [Bug] Path doesn't render #2860
  • Path Do not Work in MAUI #2206
  • InputTransparent doesn't work #5089
  • [android] ImageButton.CornerRadius operates in DP #4819
  • Shell navigation creates a void space after navigating to the target page #1551
  • [Bug] Cannot add an AndroidResource to single project #2821
  • [WinUI] Default ZIndex issue in a multi column grid #5083

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 7.0 API Reviews #27588
    7.0.0
  • Error With Temporals using InMemory Provider #27587
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27583
  • Collapse some `closed-` labels #27582
  • Question: Obfuscation guidelines #27581
  • Save SQLite file to MyDocuments #27580

Closed

  • ToLower not working with AsQueryable on sqlite #27378
  • Applying configurations for entities in DataContext #27568
  • Allow scaffolder to accept in a manifest file. #27577

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #27423 - Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27589
  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584

Updated

  • Scaffolding: Enable text templates #27565
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27423 - Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27452
  • [release/6.0] Generate temp values for key properties contained in optional FKs #27579
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x
